name: GemWords
description:
GemWords combines tasty gem popping goodness with deliciously wholesome family-friendly anagram solving! Fun for all ages, especially people that are YOUR age.

Tap or click the pivots to spin the gems, make a group of four same-colour gems to pop! If you can pop a sparkling gem, you'll receive a letter. Once you've collected all the letters for the level, solve the anagram to win!

Contact me at http://www.twitter.com/voxel if you're confused

Super cool bonus: full android version included for free :o no way!

Android notice:

Requires an armv7 device. You can check if your device will work by trying the free version from https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com....
